original_title: Mariah Carey: Daydream Tour - Live at the Tokyo Dome
overview: "The Daydream World Tour" was a concert tour by Mariah Carey in support of her platinum hit album Daydream. 150,000 tickets for her 3 Tokyo Dome concerts sold out in under 3 hours, making it the fastest selling show in the Tokyo Dome's history.
title: Live at the Tokyo Dome
